mapper.update: update tbl_user set sessionkey = #{sessionId} ,sessionlimit = #{next} where uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where sessionkey = #{value} and sessionlimit > now()

mapper.delete: delete from user_follow where id=#{myname} and follow =#{uname}
mapper.select: select uf.follow,(select uname from tbl_user where uid = uf.follow) as uname from tbl_user u left join user_follow uf on(u.uid=uf.id) where u.uid=#{uid};

select uf.id as follower, tu.uname,tu.user_profile as file, (select count(id) from user_follow where follow = uf.id) as ffcnt, (select count(rno) from review where writer=tu.uname) as frcnt from user_follow uf join tbl_user tu on (uf.id = tu.uid) where follow=#{uid};
